DataElement.preferredName: Dental Restoration Hybrid Composite Material Use Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the free-text field to specify tooth restorative material that contains both microfill composites and macrofill composites, and contains a range of particle sizes between .6 and 1 micron in diameter used in a process or procedure of replacement or reconstruction of a lost tooth structure.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Dental Restoration Hybrid Composite Material Use
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to tooth restorative material that contains both microfill composites and macrofill composites, and contains  a range of particle sizes between .6 and 1 micron in diameter used in a process or procedure of replacement or reconstruction of a lost tooth structure.
